audio_description: In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful. As-salamu Alaikum. Today we will be making the Lucknow-style wedding special "Deg" Chicken Biryani recipe. This flavorful and extremely aromatic biryani is very easy to make.

audio_description: Here’s the secret of restaurant-style biryani: on top, they add biryani essence. So take 2–3 pinches of orange food color, add half a teaspoon of biryani essence, 3 tablespoons of water, and mix well.
